asparagus and cheese

sauce the water poaching temp 160-180 F ~= bring water to simmer then back off the heat so as to remove bubbles season the water! bayleave or bouillon boneless skinless chicken thights have higher fat content skin off - 100g or 3.5oz 175calories@24Gramsprotien. skin on - 227c@23gramsProtien
